DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate clinical non-inferiority , pharmacodynamic effect safety Actparin® ( heparin sodium - Laboratório Químico Farmacêutico Bergamo Ltd. ) compare Heparin Sodium ( APP Pharmaceuticals ) patient renal failure hemodialysis treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Clinical Non-inferiority Actparin® ( Laboratorio Bergamo ) Compared Heparin Sodium ( APP Pharmaceuticals ) , Patients With Chronic Renal Failure
DOC.criteria: Patients research agree participate study sign inform consent form ; Patients age 18 year , sex , regardless color social class ; Patients impair renal function chronic hemodialysis schedule least 3 time week give use heparin prophylaxis thrombosis system ; Patients laboratory result within specified acceptance criterion . Patients take part take part another clinical investigational study within 12 month ; Hypersensitivity heparin sodium and/or benzyl alcohol ; History active hemorrhage alteration blood coagulation , genetic disorder coagulation system ; History disease could aggravate terminate clinical manifestation , active peptic gastric ulcer ; Severe liver disease ; Patients cancer treatment ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Use glucocorticoids physiological dose ; Use anticoagulant ; Patients undergo surgery perform less 15 day ; History non response exacerbate response heparin sodium ; Patients adapt 150 UI/kg dose .
